scripts.build-workers: rm -rf dist && npm run build-sam-worker && npm run build-en-worker && npm run build-es-worker && npm run build-fr-worker
scripts.build-sam-worker: webpack --env=sam && cat tools/webworkers/sam-interface.js >> dist/sam-worker.js && cp dist/sam-worker.js examples/multiplespeakers/public/webworkers
scripts.build-en-worker: webpack --env=en && cat tools/webworkers/espeak-interface.js >> dist/espeak-en-worker.js && cp dist/espeak-en-worker.js examples/multiplespeakers/public/webworkers
scripts.build-es-worker: webpack --env=es && cat tools/webworkers/espeak-interface.js >> dist/espeak-es-worker.js && cp dist/espeak-es-worker.js examples/multiplespeakers/public/webworkers
scripts.build-fr-worker: webpack --env=fr && cat tools/webworkers/espeak-interface.js >> dist/espeak-fr-worker.js && cp dist/espeak-fr-worker.js examples/multiplespeakers/public/webworkers
